title: Investigate and categorize existing MSBuild analyzing logic - Exchange
body:
### Input

* Existing analyzing logic: [[internal link] analyzing rules](https://o365exchange.visualstudio.com/DefaultCollection/O365%20Core/_git/bothell?path=%2Fsources%2Fdev%2FPackageOverrides%2Fsrc%2FMsBuild%2FCustomTasks%2FRules&version=GC6228f33dbf9cfc90942c17f45c37f9ea4ed2ff14)

### Expected output

* List of categories of rules (with possible different dimensions of categorization - required input types; repo/project specific vs universal; phase of build when those can run (evaluation, build, postbuild); level of complexity of the rule; etc.)
* Notable examples of rules per category
* [optional] indication of candidates for intial spiking (rules that are universaly applicable, with low leve of complexity)

nodes.body:
Intermediate outputs (all intentionally internal):
 * categorization and labeling of existing rules: [OneNote](https://microsoft.sharepoint.com/teams/DotNetTeam/_layouts/15/Doc.aspx?sourcedoc={a2a284d4-baec-4dc6-b748-0b4f4ac61d2d}&action=edit&wd=target%28Prior%20Art.one%7C878ca22f-df11-4bda-a24e-4a50c34c1eed%2FPrior%20art%20Substrate%20ProjectCop%7C3939ba9d-0f44-43fa-97bb-acbbb0cb20fa%2F%29&wdorigin=703)
 *  design thoughts and inceptions: [OneNote](https://microsoft.sharepoint.com/teams/DotNetTeam/_layouts/15/Doc.aspx?sourcedoc={a2a284d4-baec-4dc6-b748-0b4f4ac61d2d}&action=edit&wd=target%28API%20Shape.one%7C92618ff8-46e9-4472-9908-27496d090ecd%2FIdes%20from%20Exchange%5C%2FProjectCop%20rules%7C157c7765-b73d-461d-84b2-55fb4fab9756%2F%29&wdorigin=703)
